document.full_text: thousands of youth supporters of ivory coast's laurent gbagbo gathered around his presidential palace on saturday in a show of support, as days of fierce fighting between his security forces and insurgents continued.
document.title: gbagbo supporters rally as clashes continue
lines_and_colors: thousands of youth supporters of ivory coast's laurent gbagbo gathered around his presidential palace on saturday in a show of support, as days of fierce fighting between his security forces and insurgents continued.
